name: Citadel of Agony
description: A lone marine, you're thrust into the heart of the town you call home, overrun by demons. You're standing against immeasurable odds. The UAC has quarantined the vicinity after a failed attempt to exterminate the demons, in a last attempt to stop the demons from infesting the neighboring countries. They've decided to nuke the city. Now you have to make it out of here before you die with your home town.
